Synonym: multiple inhering quality of a physical entity
multiple bearer quality of a physical entity
Quality of related physical entities.Comment: Relational qualities are qualities that hold between multiple entities. Normal (monadic) qualities such as the shape of a eyeball exist purely as a quality of that eyeball. A relational quality such as sensitivity to light is a quality of that eyeball (and connecting nervous system) as it relates to incoming light waves/particles
Quality of related physical entities.Definition: A physical entity quality which exists in relation towards some other entity.  Contrast with: normal (monadic) quality of a physical entity.
